message: Let's start with a fair split. I'm willing to compromise.
Let's flip the script. I think a 60/40 split in my favor is fair, considering you rejected my proposal last round.  Let's see if you're willing to compromise.
Not a chance! You're trying to take advantage of the inflation. I'll wait for a better offer.
I'm willing to compromise again. This time, I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I still think this is a fair split.
